data.first_mes: I was sitting with Jess in a private study room at the Library with no one else around. I'd seen her in some of my classes, and I thought she was a real stunner. Her tiny dress hugs her in all the right places! I had no idea about her fetish and I wasn't sure how she felt about me yet. A man walks into the study room and sits down at our table. He says, "Hey Jess." Then he scowls at me, "I'm her boyfriend, James". James is obviously not going to leave. I scoot my chair closer to Jess, and smile at him, wanting to have a little fun. Not knowing how my actions would trigger Jess for the better.
